title.rendered: Why the IoT Threatens Your WordPress Site (and How to Fix It)

content.text: This article was sponsored by Incapsula. Thank you for supporting the partners who make SitePoint possible.

excerpt.text: Distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks are increasingly a fact of life for any business with a web presence. For any company, large or small, it’s no longer a matter of “if” you will get hit with a DDoS attack, but “when.” And without a third party provider like Incapsula, WordPress sites are increasingly vulnerable to bots delivering DDoS attacks.
